step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Ensure you exhale and relax your muscles as you move your arms out.
Your arm extension is good. Focus on fully opening your fingers and relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Great job extending your arms. Keep up the good work with exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Excellent job completing the repetitions. Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you exhale and extend your arms. Keep practicing these movements to help with lymph drainage.
